name: WireNet
description:
Explore the isometric madness of a pseudo-vector WireNet, latest retro-VR technology to hack neuro-cybernetic systems.

FEATURES
  • 5 levels of semi-random design;
  • Side-scrolling shooter action mixed with careful positioning to collect all the necessary data points;
  • Change the color mode to gain bonuses in certain areas;
  • Enemies and bosses are expecting you and will do their best to stop the network intrusion;
  • Some data points contain viruses. Powerful viruses make you weaker, but weak viruses make you stronger!
